Submitter Information: BD Diagnostics, Becton, Dickinson and Company
Regulatory Class: Class I (BD MAX GBS Assay); Class II (BD MAX System)
Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX GBS Assay and BD MAX System for qualitative detection of Group B Streptococcus DNA from vaginal-rectal swabs using automated extraction and real-time PCR
Indications for Use Summary: A qualitative in vitro diagnostic assay to detect Group B Streptococcus DNA in Lim Broth cultures from vaginal-rectal swab specimens from antepartum pregnant women to aid in determining colonization status, performed on the BD MAX System
